RP Daley.com | Recipes | Sheet Pan Cashew Chicken

Tender chunks of succulent chicken, coated in a flavourful marinade of soy sauce, honey, and ginger, take centre stage on the sheet pan. This recipe transforms humble ingredients into a symphony of taste and texture, all cooked to perfection on a single sheet pan for easy cleanup and a stress-free dining experience.

structuredData.description: Tender chunks of succulent chicken, coated in a flavourful marinade of soy sauce, honey, and ginger, take centre stage on the sheet pan. This recipe transforms humble ingredients into a symphony of taste and texture, all cooked to perfection on a single sheet pan for easy cleanup and a stress-free dining experience.

recipeIngredient: 3 boneless, skinless chicken breasts (cut into 1/2-1 inch pieces)

recipeInstructions.text: Line a large baking sheet with parchment paper
Add chicken, broccoli, bell pepper and cashews
Mix together all of the sauce ingredients in a small bowl
Pour 3/4 of the sauce on the chicken and veggies, and toss to coat evenly
Roast for 25 minutes, tossing halfway through
Top chicken and veggies with remaining sauce, and toss
Serve with rice of choice and top with cilantro
